In England, in the seven days to 24 May, there were 13,945 new confirmed cases (24.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 17 May, there were 11,616 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 20% (2,329 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 29 May is 3,910,803 (6,948 cases per 100,000 population).
